video_prompt: Futuristic woman's flowing white hair ripples. Her metallic liquid-silver and gold attire shimmers and reshapes, golden accents coiling and flowing. Binary code and abstract metallic forms drift and pulse in the dark background, reflecting light. Text elements subtly phase in and out, glowing. Lighting dynamically shifts, emphasizing movement.
image_prompt: Futuristic, ethereal AI woman with long white hair in elaborate liquid-metal outfit (silver and gold), set against a dark binary code and geometric digital background. Dramatic lighting. Digital art, fantasy. (Exclude specific text details like "Simon" or "AI generated").
refined_video_prompt: Hair ripples and flows. Attire shimmers and reshapes; accents coil and flow. Code-like forms and abstract elements drift and pulse in the background, dynamically reflecting light. Text-like elements subtly phase in and out, glowing. Lighting dynamically shifts, emphasizing all movement.
